price: 35. Bakobwakela bino moto ya milinga ya nkoni to ya mabende mpe bokosungama te.
arabic: يُرۡسَلُ عَلَيۡكُمَا شُوَاظٞ مِّن نَّارٖ وَنُحَاسٞ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yur'salu ʿalaykumā shuwāẓun min nārin wanuḥāsun falā tantaṣirāni
translations: you will (be able to) defend yourselves
